#summary Marks a user account as online (if it is not already) and returns user account data.
#labels Protocol-User

This method checks if the user is already online, and if not it will update the `SessionID` and `SecureSessionID` user data fields with randomly generated session IDs before returning all of the user account data. LastLoginDate is updated after the user account data is returned.

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||GetPresence||String||Yes||
||`UserID`||UUID of the user to bring online||UUID||Yes||

{{{
RequestMethod=GetPresence
&UserID=efb00dbb-d4ab-46dc-aebc-4ba83288c3c0
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if user account data was returned, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
|| *`Variable Fields`* ||Free form key value pairs||`*`||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":"true",
    "UserID":"efb00dbb-d4ab-46dc-aebc-4ba83288c3c0",
    "Name":"John Doe",
    "Email":"john.doe@email.com",
    "SessionID":"23e8bfa6-2123-4499-9670-9fe537e3e1f7",
    "SecureSessionID":"905e167a-0330-4b5c-9a1e-f940e2925303",
    "CreationDate":"1261042614",
    "LastLoginDate":"1264728529",
    "HomeLocation":"http://examplegrid.com/regions/Homeland/128/128/25",
    "LastLocation":"http://examplegrid.com/regions/BraveNewWorld/53/97/23"
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":"false",
    "Message":"User does not exist"
}
}}}
